name: teachprojectorrepair
description: Angelina knows how to fix stuff.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'Would you be willing to help me out with a simple maintenance job?'

dialogue.response:
'Thankyou!'
'It's pretty simple, I need someone to fix the projector in Poppy for me.'
'I think someone knocked it off of the table'
'Here's a bulb. You might need to do a bit of a repair on it as well though.'

'Thanks for nothing.'
'Let's hope you don't need anything from me in future.'

'Hi again $player.'
'Any chance you could help me out now?'

delivers.name: bulb
delivers.detailedDescription: A critical part of a projector. It's fragile, don't drop it!

reward.message: Angelina hands you a projector bulb.

fail.message: I bet you're always the first to make a fuss if things don't work when you need them.
